ygData.subject: Locations of metal and molds
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow smiths. I have done extensive smithing on the continent of Faydwer and around the Freeport area of Antonica, but the other areas of the world are
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow smiths.

I have done extensive smithing on the continent of Faydwer and around the
Freeport area of Antonica, but the other areas of the world are something of a
mystery for me. I'd like to compile a list of all the places you can buy molds,
ore and sheet metal -- but I need your help. Here is my list so far:

Ore

Windmills in Steamfont
Shadowknight guild, Grobb
The weapon shop in North Freeport
Somewhere in Highpass Hold (details requested here)

Small Molds

Misty Thicket, near Rivervale
Butcherblock Mountains, near Kaladim

Medium Molds

East Freeport, Armor by Ikthar
Kelethin, main lift platform

Large Molds

The "two tents" area of Everfrost, near Halas

Sheet Metal

Mold vendor in Kelethin
Mold vendor in East Freeport

This is an important resource for smiths, I believe, so if you know of some that
I have missed, please send them here.

Jyzan
